entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 12:25 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
